title: november 2: requiem for a rastafarian (with Loud Luxury)
description:
Today on the pod, Maia introduces a pivotal figure in sub-Saharan African politics and the Rastafarian movement: none other than Haile Selassie himself, who became the emperor of Ethiopia today in 1930. She is also joined by musical guest Loud Luxury to talk about their biggest day on tour. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
